action.string: Represents the final target location you want to reach(-1 is null). Ribbit IV: 10:REGENHOME_0 11:BOSSSPOT_0(RED) 12:LAUNCHLEFT(BROKEN) 13:FINALSTAND_0 14:UPPERLANE_LEFT 15:UPPERLANESECOND_0 16:UPPERHP_0 17:BOTTOMLEFT_TOWER2(RED) 18:BOTTOMLANESECOND_0 19:BOTTOMHP_0 110:NEUTRALSIDESPOT_0 111:NEUTRAL_LEFT1(RED) 112:NEUTRALCENTERSPOT_0 20:REGENHOME_1 21:BOSSSPOT_ 0(BLUE) 22:LAUNCHRIGHT(BROKEN) 23:FINALSTAND_1 24:FIRSTHP_1 25:UPPERLEFT_TOWER2(BLUE) 26:UPPERLANESECOND_1 27:UPPERHP_1 28:BOTTOMLEFT_TOWER2(BLUE) 29:BOTTOMLANESECOND_1 210:BOTTOMHP_1 211:NEUTRALSIDESPOT_1 212:NEUTRAL_LEFT1 213:NEUTRALCENTERSPOT_1 30:CENTERHP 31:UPPERLANE 32:BOTTOMLANE
